availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John B. Watts (Fayette County, Kentucky, carpenter and farmer. )

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, carpenter and farmer. Virginia native. Married to Harriett Ann Jeeter Watts. Father of William B. Watts and Jane Watts. Carpenter in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Fayette County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 1, p. 115A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Athens, p. 447.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 26324.
